faq.faqDescription: Have more questions? We understand that every situation is unique.If your concern wasn't addressed in the FAQs, feel free to get in touch—we're always here to provide the support you need.

faqList.question: What are the technical requirements for learning at SkillBridge?
faqList.answer: To use SkillBridge, you need a smartphone or computer and internet access. For registration, access to one of the supported digital payment methods is required.

faqList.question: How do I get started with SkillBridge?
faqList.answer: Sign up on our website, choose your course, and follow the instructions to begin learning.

faqList.question: Do you give certificates after completion?
faqList.answer: Yes, you will receive a certificate after successfully completing your course.

faqList.question: Does SkillBridge provide job opportunities?
faqList.answer: We connect top-performing students with partner companies and job opportunities where available.

faqList.question: Who can learn your courses?
faqList.answer: Anyone with a passion for tech and willingness to learn can join our courses.

faqList.question: In what language are you providing the courses?
faqList.answer: Our courses are primarily in English, but we are working to add more languages.

faqList.question: When do we start learning the courses?
faqList.answer: You can start learning immediately after enrolling in a course.

faqList.question: What can I do if I forget my password on website registration?
faqList.answer: Use the 'Forgot Password' link on the login page to reset your password.

faqList.question: Can I get registered via email?
faqList.answer: Yes, you can register using your email address on our sign-up page.

faqList.question: Is it an online class or online course?
faqList.answer: SkillBridge offers both live online classes and self-paced online courses to fit your schedule.

courses.title: Complete Web Development Bootcamp
courses.description: Learn HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Node.js and more to become a full-stack web developer
courses.longDescription: This comprehensive course is designed to take you from beginner to professional in web development. You'll learn front-end and back-end technologies, build real-world projects, and gain the skills needed to land your first developer job or freelance clients.
courses.instructorBio: John has over 10 years of experience in web development and has worked with companies like Google and Facebook. He's passionate about teaching and has helped over 50,000 students learn to code.
learningOutcomes: Build 16+ web development projects for your portfolio
Learn HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, React, Node.js, MongoDB, and more
Create a full-stack web application from scratch
Understand how to connect and work with databases

courses.title: Machine Learning A-Z: Hands-On Python & R
courses.description: Learn to create Machine Learning Algorithms in Python and R from two Data Science experts
learningOutcomes: Master Machine Learning on Python & R
Make accurate predictions with regression algorithms
Create powerful analysis using classification algorithms
Implement clustering algorithms to segment data
Learn to use neural networks and deep learning
Apply ML to real-world business problems
prerequisites: Basic programming knowledge is helpful but not required

courses.title: The Complete Digital Marketing Course
courses.description: Master Digital Marketing Strategy, Social Media Marketing, SEO, YouTube, Email, Facebook Marketing
learningOutcomes: Grow a business online from scratch
Master SEO, social media marketing, and email marketing
Create effective Facebook and Google ads
Build a WordPress website with no coding required
Develop a comprehensive digital marketing strategy
prerequisites: Willingness to implement the strategies taught

success.title: Why Choose Skillbridge?
success.subtitle: Join our global community of learners and transform your career with our industry-leading courses.

footer.title: About SkillBridge
footer.description: Bridging Gaps, Building Skills, Transforming Futures. We provide high-quality online courses to help you advance your career.

contactPage.description: We're happy to help! Reach out to us for any questions, feedback, or support.

aboutPage.title: Transforming Careers Since 2020!
aboutPage.description: SkillBridge Technologies - Where passionate learners become industry-ready developers through hands-on projects, expert mentorship, and proven learning methodologies.
aboutPage.storyText1: SkillBridge Technologies was founded in 2020 with a simple yet powerful vision: to bridge the gap between traditional education and the rapidly evolving tech industry. Our founders, experienced software engineers and educators, recognized that many talented individuals were struggling to break into the tech field due to outdated curricula and lack of practical, hands-on experience.
aboutPage.storyText2: What started as a small coding bootcamp in a shared workspace has grown into a comprehensive school of software development, serving thousands of students worldwide. We believe that everyone deserves access to quality tech education, regardless of their background or previous experience.
aboutPage.storyText3: Our story is one of passion, dedication, and the unwavering belief that with the right guidance and support, anyone can master the art of software development and build a successful career in technology.

purpose.title: Our Purpose
purpose.subtitle: We exist to democratize tech education and create pathways for anyone to build a successful career in software development.

mission.title: Mission
mission.description: To provide world-class, practical software development education that transforms lives. We bridge the gap between learning and doing, ensuring every graduate is not just knowledgeable but job-ready and confident.

vision.title: Vision
vision.description: To become the global standard for practical tech education, where talent and dedication matter more than traditional credentials. We envision a world where our graduates lead innovation at every level of the tech industry.

methodology.title: Our Learning Methodology
methodology.description: How we turn beginners into job-ready developers

lists.heading: Learn by Doing
lists.paragraph: Start coding from day one. Every concept is immediately applied in hands-on projects that simulate real work environments.

lists.heading: Build Real Projects
lists.paragraph: Create applications that solve actual problems. Your portfolio will showcase real solutions, not just tutorial projects.

lists.heading: Get Expert Feedback
lists.paragraph: Receive detailed code reviews and personalized guidance from industry professionals who've been where you want to go.

lists.heading: Land Your Dream Job
lists.paragraph: Leverage our industry connections, interview prep, and job placement support to secure your first developer role.

whyUs.title: Why Students Choose SkillBridge
whyUs.subtitle: The learning experience that actually prepares you for your first dev job

cards.title: Industy-Relevant Curriculum
cards.description: Our courses are designed by industry professionals and updated regularly to reflect current market demands and emerging technologies. Stay ahead of the curve with cutting-edge skills that employers are actively seeking.

cards.title: Expert Instuctors
cards.description: Learn from experienced software engineers and tech leaders who bring real-world experience into the classroom. Get insights from professionals who have worked at top companies and understand what it takes to succeed.

cards.title: Hands-On Learning
cards.description: Build real projects and gain practical experience through our project-based learning approach and coding challenges. Every lesson includes practical exercises that reinforce your understanding and build your portfolio.

cards.title: Career Support
cards.description: Comprehensive career services including resume building, interview preparation, and job placement assistance. Our dedicated career team works with you from day one to ensure you're ready for your dream job.

cards.title: Flexible Learning
cards.description: Choose from full-time, part-time, and online options to fit your schedule and learning preferences. Whether you're working full-time or looking for an intensive bootcamp experience, we have options that work for you.

cards.title: Proven Results
cards.description: 85% job placement rate within 6 months of graduation with competitive starting salaries. Our track record speaks for itself - we're committed to your success and have the results to prove it.

learningPaths.title: Complete Learning Paths
learningPaths.subtitle: From zero to hired - structured programs that get results.
